name: An Almost Impossible Mission
description:
Greeting soldier! Be honour, you are assigned to execute "The Almost Impossible Mission" !! Play this game on Unity WebGL Player

What you need to do is to break throught enermy's secrect base, surviving yourself from bullets and completed 2 tasks in a limited time or elses the helicopter will leave you behind! 

How to play

Movement - W A S D

Jump - Space

Fire - Left Click 

Reload - R

Please help us by rating this game! Feel free to comment what you think. Our team :
